channel.title: Help With Adding God Sword Tut *easy,easy,easy*
channel.description:
I followed moparclients "adding godswords correctly tutorial" and when I compiled and ran server this error came up... [code]---Project16 V.6 by Wolf |-Enabled-| --- ClientHandler: Accepted from 192.168.2.2:2271 phalanx is signing onto server. Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ExceptionInInitializerError at Player.appendPlayerAppearance(Player.java:762) at Player.appendPlayerUpdateBlock(Player.java:906) at PlayerHandler.updatePlayer(PlayerHandler.java:304) at client.initialize(client.java:14302) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:214) at server.main(server.java:50) Caused by: java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 15332 at Item.<clinit>(Item.java:126) ... 6 more ClientHandler: Accepted from 192.168.2.2:2272 phalanx is signing onto server. [client-2-phalanx]: phalanx is already online. [/code]
Someone better help me with this because I want to add these godswords tonight!!!!!:D

ThatOneServer:

That means you changed something on Player.java line 762. Look around there for something wrong.

Not on line 762. The guy who posted second had the right line.

item.title: Help With Adding God Sword Tut *easy,easy,easy*
item.dc:creator: @dogzound5 dogzound5@gmail.com
item.description:
@dogzound5 wrote:

Its somewhere wrong in this…in the tut moparclient did not exactly specify how to add this

try { FileInputStream dataIn = new FileInputStream(new File("data/twohanded.dat")); while ((c = dataIn.read()) != -1) { if (c == 0) itemTwoHanded[counter] = false; else itemTwoHanded[counter] = true; counter++; itemTwoHanded[15332] = true; itemTwoHanded[15333] = true; itemTwoHanded[15334] = true; itemTwoHanded[14335] = true; } dataIn.close();

How do I correctly add the godswords in that because that is the problem…

Read full topic
